title: Australian diary. No. 032
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: A craftsman’s models of the ships and seacraft used in the South-west Pacific area provides a record of the war at sea; novel races at a North Queensland school sports; hop picking in Tasmania; the commencement of the Snowy River Hydro-electric Scheme.
